text:
@NickMincher @EnvAgencyMids Hi Nick, we'll aim to take as many questions from the phones as we can but happy to address pre-sent questions if we get a chance. 

Please send to Engagement_WestMids@environment-agency.gov.uk & if we don't get to it Wednesday we'll add it to the revised website Q&A coming soon.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I bought my first house 1 year ago this week (3 miles from the quarry). Due to lockdown my Dad has just had his first coffee with me inside!! ☺️
I had to apologise as the stink started pouring in.

It usually makes me angry but now I just feel so sad...

Please fight for us Clare

RT @CefasGovUK: It’s #INNSweek 2021! We'll share some of our research on Invasive Non Native Species

1st up, an impossible task? We review…
@EnvAgencySE @janifranck @EnvAgency This is a complex, step by step process, and please be assured that we’re doing everything we can to identify the third party and have this issue resolved.  (3/3)
@EnvAgencySE @janifranck @EnvAgency We’re also looking into having the chamber/ tank on the outfall cleaned while trying to stop the root cause of the pollution. (2/3)
@EnvAgencySE @janifranck @EnvAgency Hi there, our investigations have narrowed the source down to 2 locations where we now need network protection to get involved. (1/3)

@NofromConsett @RicHolden @nwater_care @HownsgillEnergy @EnvAgency Not sure... It looks like at least 5 or 6 km away. The enormous #Lakeside incinerator (inc. hazardous waste burner) is surrounded by reservoirs. ☠️☢️🚱 https://t.co/6GhN2Ebiia

text: @N_Rivers_Trust @ShamsGalib @EnvAgencyAnglia @GlavenEel @banhamzoo @WildTroutTrust @Eleri_Pritchard @Dan_Chadwick1 @DrCrayfish Even the signal crayfish cannot compete in a “CLEAN “ English river with trout, chub, barbel, burbot, herons, polecats, otters etc. It’s just most are not clean these days.

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids We plan to give a short update (~10/15 mins) & then go to questions from the phones: taking as many as we can in the time. We've chosen this facility because it allows many more people to join than via Zoom. And we will come in person as soon as #COVID19 guidelines allow.

RT @EnvAgencyYNE: Thousands of #trees planted at #BrownleeTriathlonCentre in #Leeds #yorkshire to reduce #flood risk and mitigate #climatec…

@mrnathannelson @RussellB1ggs @WildTroutTrust @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgency @The_WMA @NENorfolkSufflk @AnglianWater @WestNorfolkBC One reason I got my drone and licence was to be able to fly at certain angles over the landscape to pick out the clues. Finding paleochannels is great fun!!!

@ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids I can't make it at such short notice but please can someone ask why the Quarry has started to smell so badly at night, specifically exactly 10pm over the weekends.

@mrnathannelson @RussellB1ggs @WildTroutTrust @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgency @The_WMA @NENorfolkSufflk @AnglianWater @WestNorfolkBC Yes, there are all kinds of hints including lidar data and all kinds of maps. Alongside that looking at drains, woodlands, finding clues in the landscape too, often with the soil N Norfolk has its hard to find traces so have to look harder.
@fungi_flowers @EnvAgency Fit for purpose?
